title: Chili Cheese Dip from Hormel Chili
description: This Hormel chili cheese dip is easy to make in the microwave. Serve warm with corn chips for a deliciously cheesy football snack guaranteed to please!

About Us The Allrecipes Allstars How to Add a Recipe GET THE MAGAZINE Recipes Trusted Brands: Recipes and Tips HORMEL Chili Chili Cheese Dip from Hormel Chili 4.7 (31) 28 Reviews 14 Photos This Hormel chili cheese dip is delicious and super easy. Whether you need a tailgating triumph or a satisfying snack, this tasty dip is guaranteed to be a hit with any crowd. Serve with tortilla chips. By Allrecipes Member Updated on January 24, 2025 Save Rate Print Share Close Add Photo 14 14 14 14 Prep Time: 5 mins Cook Time: 5 mins Total Time: 10 mins Servings: 8 Jump to Nutrition Facts Cook Mode (Keep screen awake) Ingredients 1x 2x 4x Oops! Something went wrong. Our team is working on it. Original recipe (1X) yields 8 servings 1 (16 ounce) package processed cheese food (such as Velveeta®), cut into ½-inch cubes 1 (15 ounce) can HORMEL® Chili No Beans Directions Combine cheese cubes and chili in a microwave-safe bowl. Cover and microwave on high, stirring once, until cheese is melted and mixture is hot, 4 ½ to 5 minutes. Serve warm. I Made It Print 91 home cooks made it! Nutrition Facts (per serving) 265 Calories 20g Fat 5g Carbs 17g Protein Show Full Nutrition Label Hide Full Nutrition Label Nutrition Facts Servings Per Recipe 8 Calories 265 % Daily Value * Total Fat 20g 26% Saturated Fat 12g 59% Cholesterol 63mg 21% Sodium 1088mg 47% Total Carbohydrate 5g 2% Dietary Fiber 1g 3% Total Sugars 1g Protein 17g 33% Calcium 309mg 24% Iron 0mg 1% Potassium 95mg 2% * Percent Daily Values are based on a 2,000 calorie diet. Your daily values may be higher or lower depending on your calorie needs. ** Nutrient information is not available for all ingredients. Amount is based on available nutrient data. (-) Information is not currently available for this nutrient. If you are following a medically restrictive diet, please consult your doctor or registered dietitian before preparing this recipe for personal consumption. Add Your Photo Photos of Chili Cheese Dip from Hormel Chili 01 of 14 Photo by  Marianne 02 of 14 Photo by  angelinamarie3 12/09/2019 Pretty darn simple! You can’t really go wrong with this one- it goes quickly & is extremely popular for an easy appetizer. My only issue: it solidifies extremely quick after heating & removing from heat. So, if you have one of the mini slow cookers- keeping it in that is ideal to keep it at the warm, creamy consistency. Otherwise, you’ll need to keep warming it if it sits for more than 30 minutes, having to stir it before it begins to solidify. Served this with some Frito scoops & tortilla chips- perfect combo for taco night, as many opted to “sauce” up their tacos, too! 03 of 14 Photo by  Eric Roby 02/03/2019 04 of 14 Photo by  CoOkInGnUt 03/27/2016 05 of 14 Photo by  Rae 03/26/2016 Nice quick dip. Everyone loved it with chips. But I put it on top of tater tots instead of dipping chips in it :) Yummers! 06 of 14 Photo by  Liz Dalton 'Lizzie' 03/23/2016 Doesn't get any easier than this! Great taste and will make again and again! 07 of 14 Photo by  Doug Matthews 03/19/2016 An easy family favorite from the very first time we made it. So consistent & so versatile too. 08 of 14 Photo by  Marianne 03/10/2016 09 of 14 Photo by  Amanda 03/09/2016 Chili and Velveeta cheese- what's not to love about that combo?! This would be great for a party dip while watching sports or for having an easy appetizer for guests! 10 of 14 Photo by  Blessed Baker 03/09/2016 This Velveeta was so overpowering that it was difficult to tell that there was chili in the recipe. My husband commented the same. So I decided to add another can of the chili and it was much better. It still seemed to lack something. I may try this again and use one can of chili and one can of Rotel tomatoes. We ate this with tortilla chips and also experimented with garlic bread sticks. 1 2 Next You’ll Also Love Chili Dip 63 Ratings Warm Chili Cheese Dip 21 Ratings Chili Cheese Dip 139 Ratings Chorizo Queso Dip 40 Ratings Best Cheese Dip 17 Ratings Outrageous Warm Chicken Nacho Dip 890 Ratings Easy Mexi-Cheese Dip 9 Ratings Easy Jalapeño Popper Dip 3,731 Ratings Hot Pizza Dip 799 Ratings Nacho Cheese Sauce 638 Ratings Carrie's Southern Queso 14 Ratings Mexican Layered Dip 268 Ratings Guinness Beer Cheese Dip 77 Ratings Famous Queso Dip 68 Ratings Best Football Dip Ever 132 Ratings Baked Buffalo Chicken Dip 294 Ratings Allrecipes Newsletters Follow Us Dinners Meals Ingredients Occasions Cuisines Kitchen Tips News Features About Us Editorial Process Privacy Policy Product Vetting Terms of Service Advertise Careers Contact Your Privacy Choices   Allrecipes is part of the Dotdash Meredith publishing family. name: Allrecipes Member
instructions: Combine cheese cubes and chili in a microwave-safe bowl. Cover and microwave on high, stirring once, until cheese is melted and mixture is hot, 4 ½ to 5 minutes. Serve warm.
